testcase.name: testShow

error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: class org.academiadecodigo.bootcamp.Prompt.
Mockito can only mock non-private & non-final classes. If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please report to the mailing list.
Java : 10 JVM vendor name : "Oracle Corporation" JVM vendor version : 10.0.1+10 JVM name : Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 10.0.1+10 JVM info : mixed mode OS name : Mac OS X OS version : 10.13.5
Underlying exception : java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: Cannot define class using reflection
